arts.ttl: Crystal Palace equal record points tally with win at Spurs
arts.sum: Ahead of kick-off, Glasner believed that continuity within his squad was key for momentum heading into their FA Cup final against Manchester City next weekend, and that proved to be the case at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Sunday. They almost added a third, but Kinsky was on hand to thwart Matetaâ€™s effort from inside the box before substitute Eddie Nketiah saw his strike in second-half stoppage time saved by the Spurs keeper.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou sets unwanted Tottenham record after Crystal Palace defeat
Tottenham 0-2 Crystal Palace: Player ratings as much-changed Spurs downed by Eze brace
arts.sum: Crystal Palace cruised to victory over Tottenham Hotspur 2-0, earning their first win at their London foes since 1997 and first-ever league double.

arts.ttl: Eberechi Eze bags brace as Tottenham brought back down to earth in Palace defeat

arts.ttl: Why Palace Goal Vs Spurs Was Ruled Out for Offside Despite Mateta Being in Own Half
arts.sum: An explanation has been given as to why Ismaila Sarr's goal for Crystal Palace was ruled out for offside against Tottenham.

arts.ttl: Tottenham suffer huge injury scare before Europa League final as key attacker taken off against Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur are dealt another potentially devastating injury blow ahead of the Europa League final, as Dejan Kulusevski comes off against Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Newcastle v Chelsea and El ClÃ¡sico headline crucial set of games â€“ matchday live
arts.sum: Follow all the latest news and buildup to Sundayâ€™s games Live scores | Tables | And mail matchday live or post BTL Napoli are three wins away from only the fourth Scudetto in their history. But the relationship between fanbase and manager feels coldly transactional. Assessing Antonio Conte is difficult. On the one hand, his career has been a story of consistent success. If Napoli do win Serie A it will be his sixth league title with four clubs in two countries in 13 years, a period in which he also transformed an unremarkable Italy into a dynamic side who beat Spain at Euro 2016 before going out to Germany in an 18-penalty shootout. On the other, itâ€™s a tale of strife and constant tension. For club directors, he is a permanent migraine. Continue reading...
